roleset.name: to build again

example.name: transitive
example.text: Corn prices have been sluggish this fall despite the huge Soviet orders because the harvest has allowed farmers to rebuild the stockpiles depleted [*] by the 1988 drought .
example.arg: the stockpiles depleted [*] by the 1988 drought

example.name: unspecified subject
example.text: It [*EXP*-1] suddenly dawns on Mr. Hammack that [*] rebuilding the house in Los Gatos , an affluent community in Santa Clara County , may cost more than Aetna 's policy will pay [*?*] .
example.arg: in Los Gatos , an affluent community in Santa Clara County ,

roleset.note: Comparison with 'build'. Member of Vncls create-26.4. VN updated by Julia, 10/2010.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'rebuild' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
